snippet.title: Death Horizon - Official Trailer | Oculus Go/Gear VR
snippet.description:
Oculus Gear VR: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/gear-vr/1164252963696830/

Google Daydream: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dreamdev.deathhorizon.daydream

In the secret Horizon laboratory, a horrific virus has broken free, and now all the employees have turned to zombies. Only the game’s protagonist can prevent the downfall of humanity. Your task is to make your way to the station’s reactor and disable the distribution of the virus. To do that, you’ll need to kill all the enemies in your path and complete the tasks. Come back alive too, if you can.

Subscribe for more videos! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTVDK3YAtJw8qsEvpAVS3KA

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/deathhorizonvr
Get updates on Facebook: http://facebook.com/deathhorizonvr/
